thread.title: SDN and OpenFlow World Congress: Why Open Source Poses a Business Risk
thread.title_full: SDN and OpenFlow World Congress: Why Open Source Poses a Business Risk

author: Fratto, Mike
title: SDN and OpenFlow World Congress: Why Open Source Poses a Business Risk
text: October 15, 2015 Rate this report Analyst Blog When a vendor relies on open source for its products, it gains the benefit of community development, but the vendor also becomes tied to external forces that impact how and when they can deliver features, which poses certain risk.
